scripts.build: npm run prepare-asset && npm run myinstall && hexo generate
scripts.build-gh-page: npm run prepare-asset && npm run myinstall && hexo clean && hexo deploy
scripts.clean: rm -rf source/assets && rm -rf source_vi/assets && hexo clean
scripts.prepare-asset: npm run generate-lqip && rm -rf source/assets && cp -r  assets source
scripts.prepare-asset-vi: npm run generate-lqip && rm -rf source_vi/assets && cp -r  assets source_vi
scripts.dev: eval $(grep '^GH_' .env) && npm run prepare-asset && npm run myinstall && hexo server
scripts.dev-vi: eval $(grep '^GH_' .env) && npm run prepare-asset-vi && npm run myinstall && hexo server --config i18n/_config.vi.yml
scripts.server-vi: npm run prepare-asset-vi && hexo server --config i18n/_config.vi.yml
scripts.build-vi: npm run prepare-asset-vi && npm run myinstall && hexo generate --config i18n/_config.vi.yml
